page.title: 05MINNOWBURN YOUTH FARM
page.content: . The Minnowburn Youth Farm is situated on the road from the Giants Ring,convenient to the major housing estate of {BELVOIR}. It is about three miles from Belfast City Centre. The Youth Farm is run by Save The Children Fund.The president is Princess Anne.The people who live in the house look after the farm animals. The farm is open to students from all over the world.While they stay on the farm the students may do a voluntary years work. The farm is used for those who are under-privileged.It is also used to help unite people from different religions. The farm has been visited by the President and her husband.
